feed.title: speedata Publisher changelog (en)
feed.subtitle: New revisions for download and changelog.

entry.title: Version 2.1.8
entry.content: Extend table rows (Tr) to re-use as table header.

entry.title: Version 2.1.8
entry.content: Merge pagenumbers now accept page ranges.

entry.title: Version 2.1.7
entry.content: Bugfix for table in table and alignment. align="right" didn't work.

entry.title: Version 2.1.6
entry.content: Experimental option 'allowbreak' on Paragraph to provide a list of characters where line break may occur.

entry.title: Version 2.1.6
entry.content: Parallelise sp compare for much better performance.

entry.title: Version 2.1.5
entry.content: Bugfix table cells with align=center and a fixed width.

entry.title: Version 2.1.3
entry.content: Allow hyphenation in the second word in compound words such as longword-anotherlongword. Also enable line breaks after "/"

entry.title: Version 2.1.1
entry.content: New implemtation of paragraph splitting, should be completely backward compatible.

entry.title: Version 2.1.0
entry.content: New behaviour of contents in table cells (Td). The rules of HTML (see HTML block elements) are followed as far as possible.
